query.name: PromotionNameIDQuery
query.label: Promotion Name ID Query
query.description: Retrieves promotion name and Id. Note inner join and hard coded table names.
query.queryString: select distinct promotion.promotion_id, promotion.promotion_name from promotion INNER JOIN sales_fact_1997 sales_fact_1997 ON promotion.promotion_id = sales_fact_1997.promotion_id order by promotion.promotion_name ASC, promotion.promotion_id ASC
